info.title: OPERA Cloud Reservation Master Data Management API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Reservation Configuration in OPERA Cloud. In this module you can retrieve, create, modify or delete configuration related to Reservations, Blocks and Leisure Management.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.
